author: Jonathan Shieber
title: HBO makes some top shows, movies, and documentaries free to stream on HBO NOW and HBO GO
description: Giving people even more of a reason to stay home and follow the social distancing measures designed to stop the spread of COVID-19 in the US, HBO said it would be making 500 hours of programming free to stream over HBO NOW and HBO Go without a subscription st…
